description: WTF: What the Fractal is a free app which allows you to play with the wonders of fractal geometry. Create an infinite number unique shapes and explore the depths of each fractal structure by panning around and zooming in on specific areas that interest you.  This is both a fun and educational app to play with the mesmerizing visualizations you can create through this mathematical concept.  The program is easy enough for a child to use but the beauty generated by fractals is timeless for people of all ages.
